title: U.S. ODA Disbursements by Recipient Country and U.S. Agency
description: Official Development Assistance (ODA) is defined by international agreement under the Development Assistance Committee at the Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD/DAC). These U.S. ODA statistics provide details of U.S Official Development Assistance by country and implementing agency as reported to the OECD/DAC.
